  • Constructor Details

    • Save

      public Save​(java.lang.String worldName)
      Default Save constructor. All files are saved in C:\\(GameName)
      Parameters:
      worldName - The world to create the folder to save the entities per world
      See Also:
      Krork.getGame()

    • Save

      public Save​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String worldName)
      Save constructor with a path to save the files
      Parameters:
      path - The path to save the files
      worldName - The world to create the folder to save the entities per world

      public EntityData loadSingleData​(java.io.File file, java.lang.Class<? extends EntityData> data) throws java.io.IOException
      Method to load all data from a file (Used while loading one entity per file)
      Parameters:

      data - The class to load the data (Your extension of EntityData)
      Returns:
      Your EntityData (or the default EntityData)
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - FileReader exception
